Our passion at Hawk CFC is not only great flooring but a great user experience. No one wants to spend excess time thinking about their floor, but everyone wants it to perform. Hawk CFC provides superior flooring solutions for the residential, industrial, commercial, and food production industries. When safety, hygiene, quality, or even just good looks are of top priority, Hawk CFC is the right choice.
